subsection.name: July/August 2004 - Pluto moved out of the Incubator
subsection.p: The Pluto Project is now a sub project under the portals PMC and has moved out of the incubator. This move comes with some changes regarding mailing addresses etc. In addition Pluto now uses Subversion instead of CVS.

subsection.name: 21 March 2004 - Pluto Declaration of Intent Finalized
subsection.p: The Pluto Community has finalized a declaration of intent which clarifies the direction with which Pluto development will move forward.

subsection.name: 27 February 2004 - Pluto SubProject Documentation Available
subsection.p: The maven subproject documentation is now being generated and included in the Pluto documentation builds.

subsection.name: 10 November 2003 - Pluto Gets a Face Lift
subsection.p: Pluto is now managed by maven and it's website has subsequently recieved a face lift. http://jakarta.apache.org/pluto now contains additional information that should be helpfull in establishing this community.

subsection.name: 9 November 2003 - Pluto added to Bugzilla
subsection.p: Pluto has been added to Bugzilla (http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla). Issues, bugs, and enhancements will now be managed through this bug database.
